gmc_hdfs.replicationsimulator

Class User

  • java.lang.Object
    • gmc_hdfs.replicationsimulator.User

  • public class User
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a user which is identified by an ID. The user is able to operate on the existing data in the system.
    Since:
    GMC_HDFSSim Toolkit 1.0

      • addToRequestsQueue

        public boolean addToRequestsQueue(Request request)
        This method is for sending the request. In fact it puts the request in the queue which is for the requests of the data center and namenode takes the request data center from the queue and processes it.
        Parameters:
        request - an object of Request
        Returns:
        if success, return true

      • isOwner

        public boolean isOwner(int dataitemId)
        This method identifies if the user is the owner of this data or not? If the user is the owner, it returns true.
        Parameters:
        dataitemId - id of data item
        Returns:
        If the user is the owner, it returns true.
